08A0D2F1.POWER_KEYWORD_HEALTH_PICKUP: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD USE POWER_KEYWORD_BLOOD_ORB INSTEAD.

0A9BC922.POWER_KEYWORD_BLOOD_ORB: {c_important}{b}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/b}{/c} Heal you for 15% of your Maximum Life when picked up.

12608861.POWER_KEYWORD_IMMOBILIZE: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT KEYWORD IMMOBILIZE

1F392457.POWER_KEYWORD_BARRIER: {c_important}{b}{u}Barriers{/u}{/b}{/c} absorb damage from all sources up to a specified amount.

288E43DE.POWER_KEYWORD_BERSERK: {c_important}{b}{u}Berserking{/u}{/b}{/c} grants 25% increased damage and 15% increased Movement Speed. This effect lasts up to 5 seconds.

29E538BC.POWER_KEYWORD_CHILL_FREEZE: {c_important}{b}{u}Chilled{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies have reduced Movement Speed. Repeatedly {c_important}{b}{u}Chilling{/u}{/b}{/c} an enemy will {c_important}{b}{u}Freeze{/u}{/b}{/c} it, preventing it from moving or attacking.

359AFDD9.POWER_KEYWORD_OVERPOWER: {c_important}{b}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/b}{/c} deals bonus damage based on the sum of your current Life and {c_important}{b}{u}Fortified{/u}{/b}{/c} Life.

3ADB3DC3.POWER_KEYWORD_EXECUTE: {c_important}{b}{u}Executes{/u}{/b}{/c} are a chance to instantly kill {c_important}{b}{u}Injured{/u}{/b}{/c} Non-Elites when damaging them.

4982A851.POWER_KEYWORD_FREEZE: {c_important}{b}{u}Frozen{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies cannot move or attack. Enemies can be {c_important}{b}{u}Frozen{/u}{/b}{/c} by repeatedly {c_important}{b}{u}Chilling{/u}{/b}{/c} them.

502C4D3B.POWER_KEYWORD_IMMUNE: {c_important}{b}{u}Immune{/u}{/b}{/c} characters cannot be damaged and all negative effects are removed and prevented.

57D4E521.POWER_KEYWORD_INJURED: {c_important}{b}{u}Injured{/u}{/b}{/c} characters have less than 35% of their Life.

630BAEE6.POWER_KEYWORD_CRUSHING_BLOW: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD USE OVERPOWER KEYWORD INSTEAD OF CRUSHING BLOW

6734AEC5.POWER_KEYWORD_STEALTH: {c_important}{b}{u}Stealthed{/u}{/b}{/c} characters cannot be directly targeted by enemies. Using an attack or taking damage will instantly remove {c_white}{b}{u}Stealth{/u}{/b}{/c}.

703D01CB.POWER_KEYWORD_WEAKEN: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT USE WEAKENED

73CB6913.POWER_KEYWORD_FORTIFY: {c_important}{b}{u}Fortified{/u}{/b}{/c} characters take 10% reduced damage. You become {c_important}{b}{u}Fortified{/u}{/b}{/c} when you have more {c_important}{b}{u}Fortify{/u}{/b}{/c} than current Life.

765BA6FC.POWER_KEYWORD_CHILL: {c_important}{b}{u}Chilled{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies have reduced Movement Speed. Repeatedly {c_important}{b}{u}Chilling{/u}{/b}{/c} an enemy will {c_important}{b}{u}Freeze{/u}{/b}{/c} it.

8F398554.POWER_KEYWORD_DAZE: {c_important}{b}{u}Dazed{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies cannot attack or use Skills but are still able to move.

8F41EC75.POWER_KEYWORD_SLOW: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT KEYWORLD SLOW

8F420F3A.POWER_KEYWORD_STUN: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT KEYWORD STUN

B1B6F9E3.POWER_KEYWORD_RESOURCE_PICKUP: {c_important}{b}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/b}{/c} periodically damages surrounding enemies when picked up.

CF679FFE.POWER_KEYWORD_SPIRIT_FRAGMENT: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT KEYWORD SHADOW REALM

E8C0251E.POWER_KEYWORD_STATIONARY: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT KEYWORD STATIONARY

F4553F7D.POWER_KEYWORD_UNSTOPPABLE: {c_important}{b}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/b}{/c} characters have all Control Impairing Effects removed and prevented.

F53477BF.POWER_KEYWORD_HEALTHY: {c_important}{b}{u}Healthy{/u}{/b}{/c} characters have more than 80% of their Life.
